How to write a simple sequence of numbers in three programming languages:

::: {#fig-python}
```python
[1, 2, 3]
```
Python
:::

::: {#fig-r}
```r
1:3
```
R
:::

::: {#fig-js}
```javascript
[1, 2, 3]
```
JavaScript
:::
